name: Paywong Payments
author: paywong

sections.description:
Paywong Payments allow your customers to simply make cryptocurrency payments from their computer or mobile devices on your application.
By using our APIs and SDKs, you can quickly integrate cryptocurrency payments into any existing or new app for a seamless user experience.
sections.faq:
Where do i sign up?

You can sign up here:
https://app.paywong.com

Documentation

Follow the following url to receive your APP API TOKEN:
https://docs.paywong.com/payments/authorization-and-credentials

Who can use Paywong?

Paywong is designed for business owners and freelancers who market their goods and services digitally. Weâ€™ve built a suite of tools for you to invoice customers, add a crypto checkout to your e-commerce store and will be building more features to cater to your needs.

How much are your transaction fees?

Fees for all cryptocurrencies is currently set at 0.5% for the first 5000 early adopters who join the waitlist and participate in our referral program. Our launch fee will be set at 0.75% but might vary based on transaction volume.
